story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You got a Pokémon at the lab.
What a waste.
story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
That’s a Pokémon that’s too good for
a wimp like you.
story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0300_10:
(When I met Silver, I didn’t know anything
about Pokémon.)
story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0500_10:
(I wasn’t going to accept his way of
thinking—that only strong Pokémon that can
win are worth it.)
story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
(I journeyed around Johto to find my
answer...and because I didn’t wanna
lose to him!)
story_arceus_05_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: (I met all sorts of people and Pokémon.)
